modName: Lind's Black-Necromancer Robes Variant - Texture Replacer
summary:
High quality fully redesigned textures for the Black or Necromancer long mage robes worn by warlocks and necromancers, Male and Female, Hood and Robes available in 2048x2048.

Installation: Simply Unzip and copy the Data folder in your Skyrim directory. Replace if asked.
descriptionHtml:
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=4]Description:[/size][/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[b]
This is a texture replacer for the black or necromancer robes (Male and Female) featuring 2048x2048 textures for both the robes and the hood
Installation: Simply Unzip and copy the Data folder in your Skyrim directory. [u]Compatible with edited meshes for every body replacer.[/u] Be mindful that excessively skimpy meshes may distrupt the textures.
The .dds files should end up into Data/textures/clothes/necromancer or Data/textures/clothes/warlock[/b]
Overwrite if asked.

[center][size=2]My other robes:[/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71249/?]Black - The Warlock[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36817/?]Monk - Priest of the Divines[/url] (Updated!)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70920/?]Green - The Bosmer Mage[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36078/?]Red - The Battlemage[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59734/?]Blue - Court Wizard[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59769/?]Brown - The Wandering Wizard[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36173/?]Grey - The Moth Priest[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36049/?]Necromancer Robes[/url]

[url=http://lindsworkshop.tumblr.com/]You can stay updated on what I'm doing through my Tumblr.

[img]http://s18.postimg.org/gnyqvvwll/Tumblr_Lind.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center] -----------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=4]More Informations:[/size][/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------



I'm back, and I bring news:
I'll be updating all my older robes and release a full pack containing all of them soon. That said, I've made many many variants in the time I have been off the nexus, said variants will always be on their own, as they're not part of the robes pack I'll be releasing.

These robes are a little something I designed for my necromancer girl at first, ended up fixing the issues and uploading it, the idea was to create a sort of "scholar necromancer" feeling. You know, not a Necromancer that lives in caves or tombs, like the vast majority of the ones in game.

10/28/2015
[img]http://s13.postimg.org/rstejvg47/Necro_Hot_Files.jpg[/img]
Yeah! Thank you guys. (:


[/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=4]Credits:[/size][/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------[/center]

Halofarm's Poser.
Bethesda, because Skyrim.
exeter for adapting the vanilla mesh to UNP.

[center][i][b]To:

Mi. Gr. , Ti. Lo. , Angrylock[/b] , [b]vintagelf[/b]

Thank you for your donations, it was unexpected, but I really appreciated it. (:[/i]

[i]I'd love to add donators to the credits to show my appreciation, problem
being through Paypal I can only see your name, not the username, so [u]message me if you'd like to be added![/u][/i][u]
[/u][u]
[/u][/center]

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=4]Permissions:[/size][/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------[/center]

[u][i]Please do not redistribute or edit this file without my approval.

You are free to showcase this file in YouTube videos.

Thank you for downloading![/i][/u]
author: Lind001
